effect_entries.effect: This Pokémon inflicts twice as much damage with moves whose types match its own, rather than the usual same-type attack bonus of 1.5×.
effect_entries.short_effect: Increases the same-type attack bonus from 1.5× to 2×.

effect_entries.effect: Strengthens biting moves to 1.5× their power.
effect_entries.short_effect: Strengthens biting moves to 1.5× their power.

effect_entries.effect: This Pokémon's moves have double power against Pokémon that switched in this turn.
effect_entries.short_effect: This Pokémon's moves have double power against Pokémon that switched in this turn.
